mentionedBy.name: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cybersecurity platform for individual consumers, small businesses, enterprises, and MSPs. Enhanced attack protection utilizing system hardening, threat prevention and detection, machine learning, and behavioral analysis. Key features include endpoint protection, sandbox analyzer, network attack defense, cloud security analytics, and patch management.
